scripts.start: echo "\033[0;32m[Open]\033[0m file://`pwd`/index.html" && npm run build && node_modules/.bin/watch -p "slides.md" -c "npm run build"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m update && git push origin master && git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
